name: System Monitor
description: System Monitor is an open-source application that provides users with an application to monitor the entire Linux operating system, including running processes, resources and file systems.

en_US.description: System Monitor is an open-source application that provides users with an application to monitor the entire Linux operating system, including running processes, resources and file systems.
en_US.name: System Monitor

zh_CN.description: 系统监视器是一个开源的应用程序，为用户提供一个监控整个Linux的操作系统的程序，包括运行的进程、资源和文件系统。
zh_CN.name: 系统监视器
